Brad Keys Game Designer | Programmer

Portfolio

I live in Kitchener, Ontario, Canada. I enjoy creating games, work in the video game industry, and have a passion for learning and innovating with new technologies. I use this site to showcase my projects and discuss interesting challenges I encounter as a game developer.

Feel free to contact me about development questions or opportunities. Check out my company Rebel Hippo Inc. if you're interested in applying for a job, requesting contract Unity development, or interested in investment opportunities.

Below is a showcase of some projects I've worked on throughout my career. Click a project to see more details, and a brief account of my experience on the project.
